title: June Pona Lyrics Unnale Unnale
stanzas:
June pona july kaatre
kan paarthaa kadhal kaatre
poo poothaa thaen varume
pen paarthaa thee varume

ennaachu thonalaye
yedhaachu theriyalaiye
natpaachu love illaiye
love aachu natpillaiye

netru enbadhum
kaiyil illai
naalai enbathum
paiyil illai
indru mattume
nenjil micham undu.

thozha..
muththa koothukal yarukkaaga
moththa boomiyum
kooththukkaagathaan. (2)

June pona july kaatre
kan paarthaa kadhal kaatre
poo poothaa thaen varume
pen paarthaa thee varume

aaraikulle mazhai varumaa
veliye vaa kudhugalamaa
indha boomi pandhu
engal koodai pandhu
andha vaanam vandhu
koorai seithathindru.

karai irukkum nilavinai
salavai sei
sirai irukkum manangalai
paravai sei
endha malargalum
kanneer sindhi kandathillai.

iruppomaa velipadaiyaai
sirippomaa malar kudayaai
sirpi viralgalum
silai sedhukkume
pennin vizhigalo
nammai sedhukkume

romba kadhalai indha boomi
kandirukkum
pala maatrangal
vandhu vandhu poiyirukkum

June pona july kaatre
kan paarthaa kadhal kaatre
poo poothaa thaen varume
pen paarthaa thee varume

ennaachu thonalaye
yedhaachu theriyalaiye
natpaachu love illaiye
love aachu natpillaiye

netru enbadhum
kaiyil illai
naalai enbathum
paiyil illai
indru mattume
nenjil micham undu.

thozha..
muththa koothukal yarukkaaga
moththa boomiyum
kooththukkaagathaan. (2)
